p: days after this first immunisation the macaque was immunised with 100 µl of VRS purified ß-PL inactivated VEEV TC83 (TCID 50/ml of 2×10 10) in combination with complete Freund's adjuvant. Subsequently, 5 additional antigen injections of 100 µl were performed after 65, 90,150, 210 and 350 days with incomplete Freund's adjuvant. Ten days after the final antigen injection the immune library was generated.
